item.title: Donna add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Donna add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Donna add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "One day's exposure to mountains is better than a cartload of books." -- John Muir

item.title: Donna add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James
